name: CoagulopathiesExcludingThrombocytopenia
title: Coagulopathies Excluding Thrombocytopenia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent coagulopathies.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with coagulopathies.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts associated with thrombocytopenia.)
